data.name: 0000 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Though what's the point in keeping lookout if nothing's going to happen anyway?

data.name: 0001 (396.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Watching me mutter out of boredom, Koizumi shrugged his shoulders.

data.name: 0002 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well, as long as it keeps Miss Suzumiya satisfied...

data.name: 0003 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ...playing along with her games isn't so bad, is it not?

data.name: 0004 (396.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Koizumi appeared totally cool and calm.

data.name: 0005 (396.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't like how he feels like he has a complete understanding of everything that's going on.

data.name: 0006 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Koizumi, there's something I want to ask...

data.name: 0007 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Of course, what could it be?

data.name: 0008 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Your people's "agency" really has nothing to do with this case, right?

data.name: 0009 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed--If this were under the Agency's control I would feel rather more at ease.

data.name: 0010 (396.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Koizumi's lot are unconcerned then, huh…

data.name: 0011 (396.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Which means--I can't sit back and relax too much.

data.name: 0012 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: However…

data.name: 0014 (396.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Koizumi whispered with his brow furrowed before lightly raising one of his arms.

data.name: 0015 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Please take a look.

data.name: 0016 (396.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As Koizumi concentrated, a small orb emitting a red glow rose from his palm.

data.name: 0017 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: As you can see, it appears I can wield my abilities within the school...

data.name: 0018 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ...albeit just barely. …It is however a rather weak display.

data.name: 0019 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hmm…

data.name: 0021 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Could we not use your ESP to somehow do something about this case?

data.name: 0022 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Somehow or another I get the feeling we can.

data.name: 0023 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What though? Go ahead and do it.

data.name: 0024 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well in that regard... I'm sure you are already aware.

data.name: 0025 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: About how my abilities are limited.

data.name: 0026 (396.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I recalled the scene I saw before.

data.name: 0027 (396.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The red ball of light floating from Koizumi's hand―

data.name: 0028 (396.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: When he threw it at that enemy that was nested in an alternate space, it exploded on impact.

data.name: 0029 (396.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It more than qualifies for being labelled dangerous, surely.

data.name: 0030 (396.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: On the other hand, if we don't have any enemies showing up there's not really any point.

data.name: 0031 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Got it. If we ever need to fight someone, you can go at 'em to your heart's content.

data.name: 0032 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That is indeed my intention.

data.name: 0033 (396.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Was it just in my head, or was Koizumi actually looking uncharacteristically smug just now?

data.name: 0034 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wouldn't this be a whole lot easier if you just requested help from your "Agency"?

data.name: 0035 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I wonder... I believe it most likely that the "Agency" has already gotten a grasp...

data.name: 0036 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ...of the situation…

data.name: 0037 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I imagine the fact I haven't yet received contact means they've decided to...

data.name: 0038 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ...quietly supervise without making any needless interventions.

data.name: 0039 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So you're basically saying we can't expect any help?

data.name: 0040 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I suppose so. Perhaps they feel we can handle it on our own, I wonder?

data.name: 0041 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Or perhaps they're only planning to intervene once the situation gets more serious…?

data.name: 0042 (396.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Koizumi went quiet, appearing to be in deep thought about something.

data.name: 0043 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: For the time being... let me endorse your suggestion.

data.name: 0044 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What do you mean?

data.name: 0045 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: As you mentioned earlier--presenting a convenient truth to Miss Suzumiya―

data.name: 0046 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: A plan to resolve the situation peacefully.

data.name: 0047 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So you're saying we should look for a solution without her noticing, that is in no way...

data.name: 0048 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ...unnatural, but would satisfy her interests. Sounds like a pain.

data.name: 0049 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I consider it less bothersome than a situation where...

data.name: 0050 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ...who knows--perhaps the world could end.

data.name: 0051 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, that may be true…

data.name: 0052 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Since we've come all this way to the music room, we should see if there's anything useful.

data.name: 0053 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Unfortunately the music room is locked.

data.name: 0054 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ah yeah--it is, isn't it…

data.name: 0055 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: You'll allow me?

data.name: 0056 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We are--after all--baring the fate of the world on our shoulders.

data.name: 0057 (396.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I was gently persuaded by Koizumi…

data.name: 0058 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's just that standing around and doing is boring. Let's devise a plan.

data.name: 0059 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: A strategy--you say?

data.name: 0060 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah. A strategy to get Haruhi out of the school as soon as possible.

data.name: 0061 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: …I rather doubt Miss Suzumiya could be so easily convinced...

data.name: 0062 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's exactly why I'm saying we need to think.

data.name: 0063 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We tell her the computer society made up the stories--that they're completely baseless.

data.name: 0064 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's right--If Haruhi buys it, all will be settled nicely, but…

data.name: 0065 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Such would require us to lay groundwork with the members of the computer society.

data.name: 0066 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We can't do it thoroughly with our short amount of time. We'd need it to be water tight.

data.name: 0067 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Grr…

data.name: 0068 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Then what about someone pretending to get a sudden illness, needing to be hospitalized?

data.name: 0069 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If the performance isn't incredibly good, the act will be seen through in an instant.

data.name: 0070 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Even if we can successfully fool her, it'll all be over once we go to the hospital.

data.name: 0071 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: The feigned illness would be verifiably exposed.

data.name: 0072 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: How Miss Suzumiya would react in such a circumstance…?

data.name: 0073 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I honestly would rather not think about it.

data.name: 0074 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Grrrrr…

data.name: 0075 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Haven't you just been rejecting all my ideas? Don't you have any ideas?

data.name: 0076 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: My ideas…… you say?

data.name: 0077 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's right.

data.name: 0078 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You've done a lot of criticizing. Let's hear one of your bright ideas then.

data.name: 0079 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'm afraid I'm at a bit of a loss.

data.name: 0080 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If I'm to be completely honest with you, I too am feeling rather hopeless.

data.name: 0081 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yet you're out here complaining about other peoples suggestions, huh.

data.name: 0082 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Those were purely objective remarks.

data.name: 0083 (396.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Objective remarks, right...

data.name: 0084 (396.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: No matter where you go, there are always people who just want to complain...

data.name: 0085 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …It's about time to regroup, I suppose.

data.name: 0086 (396.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: In the end, I suppose we didn't hear anything.

data.name: 0087 (396.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Not that she'd be satisfied if we heard it while she was gone.

data.name: 0088 (396.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Use Koizumi's ESP?

data.name: 0089 (396.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Request help from the "Agency"?

data.name: 0090 (396.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Search the area

data.name: 0091 (396.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Devise a plan
